game.name: 冒険者ギルドの受付 Adventurer's Guild Reception
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: This is the Adventurer's Guild. Today, daring adventurers come here in search of a quick fortune. Become a receptionist at the Adventurer's Guild and arrange quests for unique adventurers in this training RPG game!
game.shortDescriptionEn: This is the Adventurer's Guild. Today, daring adventurers come here in search of a quick fortune. Become a receptionist at the Adventurer's Guild and arrange quests for unique adventurers in this training RPG game!
